metadata.title: CVE-2018-19839 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In LibSass prior to 3.5.5, the function handle_error in sass_context.cpp allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service resulting from a heap-based buffer over-read via a crafted sass file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-19839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.5.5-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.5-4').
